scripts.test: watchify *.spec.js -v -o test/suite.js & livereload test/ & http-server test/ -o
scripts.deploy-demo: git stash && cp el.js demo && cp -r demo demo-temp && git checkout gh-pages && mv demo-temp/* . && rmdir demo-temp && git commit -am 'Automatic gh-pages deploy' && git push && git checkout -
